text: Massimo Pezzali (born 14 November 1967), also known as Max Pezzali, is a Italian singer and songwriter from Pavia. Alongside Mauro Repetto he is the founder of the pop rock band 883 Who were really popular in Italy during the 1990s. He Is considered One of the most popular singers of Italy. Category:1967 births Category:Italian songwriters Category:Italian singers Category:Living people
title: Max Pezzali
